Package index

Text Tools

These general text functions help you working with texts.

extract_context()
Extract context for string matches
extract_date()
Extract dates from text
extract_locations()
Extract locations from strings
extract_match()
Extract text matches
extract_names()
Extract a list of possible names of individuals in texts
extract_text_similarities()
Extract similarities and differences in texts/segments
extract_title()
Extract first sentence from text
split_text()
Split texts
read_pdf()
Read text from PDFs
annotate_text()
Annotate text with NLP

Priorities

Select political priorities in political discourses.

select_priorities()
Select future priorities from political discourses

Topic

Gather political topics in political discourses.

gather_related_terms()
Gather terms related to subjects
gather_topics()
Gather topic from political discourses

Urgency

Conduct urgency analysis in political discourses.

get_urgency()
Urgency Analysis
sim_urgency()
Simulating urgency in priorities

Data

Text data for news coferences of US presidents from 1960 to 1980.

US_News_Conferences_1960_1980
US News Conferences Data from 1960 to 1980
